original_text: You are to distinguish between the holy and the common, and between the unclean and the clean,
korean_text: 그리하여야 너희가 거룩하고 속된 것을 분별하며 부정하고 정한 것을 분별하고

sentences.original_text: You are to distinguish between the holy and the common
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 거룩한 것과 속된 것을 구별해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and between the unclean and the clean
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 것과 정한 것을 구별해야 하느니라
